TopicTitle: spawn a vehicle on specific planet?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'd like to test new rockets / vehicles on specific planets, if it has all components it needs to operate, and if it is able to fly into orbit. But to modify a vehicle and fly it to the target planet every time is kinda annoying, cause you fly the same path over and over again.

Is it possible just to spawn a vehicle on specific planet or location? Maybe using some addon?

I believe "HyperEdit" is the goto for this:

Edit: I should say, I think you can achieve the same via the in game cheat menu ALT + F12 as well.

Edited July 21, 2022 by fleventeen

the cheat menu is your friend for testing.

perss alt-f12, a menu opens. there is a cheat section. you can teleport to any orbit you want.

What @king of nowhere said.

From the F12 menu, go to cheats, Set Position or Set Orbit.  The menus that come next will allow you to choose the planet or moon you want, and to set the coordinates (set position) or orbital parameters (set orbit) you want.

If you are on console (PS or XBOX), I'm not sure how to get to that menu, but it is available on console too.
Thx! Both, F12 and Addon do exactly what I wanted
